## Reflect

- What are other urban factors that contribute to transportation and accessibility to jobs and amenities?
- How can these measures help or put at disadvantage impacted communities and groups?
- How can planners and policy makers facilitate sustainable (long term) interventions that assure equitable access to mobility?
